detail_desc: Wide blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, V-neck with buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button, narrow buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre with a lace trim at the top and around the legs. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with short cap sleeves. Pleats at the front of the neckline and a zip at the back. Detachable belt with a covered metal buckle at the waist, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with print motifs. Round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps with a small metal decoration attached to one strap. Matching bottoms.

Sleeveless playsuit in woven fabric with scalloped edges. Top in a double layer with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a concealed zip at the back and short legs. Unlined.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves and a small bow at the neckline.
Skirts in soft cotton jersey with frills and an elasticated waist.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill trim around the neckline and at the cuffs, long raglan sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets and slim, straight legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a V-neck, box pleat at the front and buttoned cuffs.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes.

Adjustable, shimmering on-ear headphones with a padded headband and appliqués at the top. Integral volume limiter set at 85 dB to protect your child’s hearing. Suitable for mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 3.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 5.5 cm.
Loose-knit, long-sleeved jumper decorated with sequins. Gathers in the sides for optimum fit over the tummy.
Fancy dress costume in velour and jersey with embroidery and appliqués. Lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with laser-cut edges, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, sewn-in ties at the top, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Fitted skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high, pleated paper bag waist and wide, detachable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Buttons down the front and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Unlined.
Metal earrings in various designs. Length from 2-7 cm.
Two-button jacket in a cotton Oxford weave with a chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Hat in soft, textured-knit cotton with a knitted appliqué on top.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back with reflective details.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.

Shirt in cotton poplin with a button-down collar with concealed buttoning, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Small fabric shoulder bag with a zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with metal chain at each end. Two zipped outer compartments. Lined. Size 4x10x14.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless body in jersey crêpe with a V-neck that has a decorative tie detail at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Smocking at the top and short, wide sleeves. Unlined.
Chelsea boots in grained leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Plastic bucket with a handle at the top.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with print motifs on the front. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and tie detail at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the waist and elasticated hems.
Soft, non-wired bra top in lace. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and side support. No fasteners.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, patch front pockets, padded shoulders and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Short, A-line coat in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Sleeveless dresses in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Microfibre body with a gently sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and seat. Non-wired, mesh-lined lace cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and glued hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with press-studs.
Satin top with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and crossover straps at the back. Lined at the top.
Scarf in soft, gently draping, patterned silk.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim.
Moisturising lip balm in a mermaid-tail-shaped container with a shimmering finish. Pineapple flavour.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers, pyjamas and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs at one side and at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet. All-in-one pyjamas with press-studs down the front and the insides of the legs, and full feet. Hat with a turned-up hem.

Short sweatshirt dress made from a cotton blend with defined shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, adjustable multiway spaghetti straps and a wide elastic trim at the hem. No fasteners.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with gently rounded cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length dress in chiffon crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and pleated frills. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a pleated skirt. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Three-button jacket in a wool blend with notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, welt side pockets and an inner pocket. Unlined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle and metal-covered belt tip.
Short T-shirt dress in cotton jersey with smocking and decorative lacing at the waist. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a regular waist and extended waistband with a metal detail. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets with a concealed zip, fake back pockets and slim, tapered legs.
Double-layered hat in a soft knit with turn-up at the hem. Reversible sequin motif on the front and turn-up.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
